╭── ​ᓚᕠᗢ NattyUI 3/4bit Color Support ──╶╴╴
│ 
│ Terminals may support colors. You can colorize foreground text and background.
│ The very basic color palette consists of eight colors and may be extended with
│ eight colors which are much brighter.
│ 
│    black       blue         bright_black       bright_blue   
│    red         magenta      bright_red         bright_magenta
│    green       cyan         bright_green       bright_cyan   
│    yellow      white        bright_yellow      bright_white  
╰────╶╴╴
